body_html:
Hi. This is a diff that ignores the number of outputs on the generator node, but allows freedom of placement if the consumer nodes are not all on the same device. When they are all on the same device, it will place the generator node there.

simple_placer_diff.txt
body_text:
Hi. This is a diff that ignores the number of outputs on the generator node, but allows freedom of placement if the consumer nodes are not all on the same device. When they are all on the same device, it will place the generator node there.
simple_placer_diff.txt
body:
Hi. This is a diff that ignores the number of outputs on the generator node, but allows freedom of placement if the consumer nodes are not all on the same device. When they are all on the same device, it will place the generator node there.

[simple_placer_diff.txt](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/files/613027/simple_placer_diff.txt)
